name: Gang of Faceless
description:
In this game you will take control of the Gang of Faceless, a group of misfits fighting for survival in a low-magic universe of Cryfog. As the leader of the gang, it will be up to you to strategize and plan out each encounter as you come across enemies in tactical turn-based combat.

Each member of the Gang of Faceless has their own unique set of skills and abilities, and it will be up to you to decide how best to utilize them in battle. Do you have a stealthy character attack from behind enemy lines to take out key targets, or do you have a tank character absorb damage while your ranged attackers pick off enemies from afar? The choice is yours.
